bv2:0.2: Sumedhapatthanākathā → sumedhakathā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2); sumedhavatthukathā (pts-vp-pli1)
bv2:41.1: Buddhotivacanaṁ → buddhoti mama (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
bv2:48.2: mānusehi ca → mānussakehi ca (bj); mānusakehi ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1-2, mr)
bv2:67.6: upaṭṭhissatimaṁ → upaṭṭhissati taṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli2); taṁ upaṭṭhissati (pts-vp-pli1)
bv2:70.4: buddhabījaṁ kira → buddhabījaṅkuro (bj, pts-vp-pli1-2); buddhavījaṅkuro (sya1ed, sya2ed)
bv2:76.2: Padakkhiṇamakaṁsu → sabbe padakkhiṇamakaṁsu (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
bv2:79.4: abhiññāsu pāramiṅgato → abhiññāpāramiṁ gato (bj); abhiññāpāramiṅgato (sya1ed, sya2ed)
bv2:179.3: bhavantvantarāyā → bhavatvantarāyo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli2); bhavantvantarāyo (pts-vp-pli1)
